about_the_game:
What do you get when you combine marbles with a battle royale ring and PvP? VORTIX!

VORTIX is an online competitive game where the objective is to knock your opponent or opponents out of the shrinking ring!

What’s Included in the Demo

  • Split Screen | Play on the same device with up to 2 players.

  • Bot Matches | Select a bot and play against it!

  • Arenas | Access to a singular arena to play and compete in.

Planned Full Game Features

  • Online Multiplayer | Play with random people or your friends.

  • Ball Customization | Personalize how your ball looks in game!

  • Achievements | Showcase your skill by completing challenges within the campaign.

  • Campaign | Battle against the bots as you progress through the arena.

  • Split Screen | Play on the same device with up to 4 players!

  • Arenas | Play in a wide variety of settings.

Why Play the Demo

Get an exclusive sneak peek at the physics and competitiveness of VORTIX. Your feedback will help shape the final release, so share your thoughts and suggestions after playing!

Community Feedback

We’d love to hear your thoughts! Join us on Discord or Steam Discussions and let us know what you think.
